about_the_game:
INFORMATION


Backrooms - 2005 is an experience based on the internet mystery "The Backrooms".

STORY


September 15 2005

You fall through the floor in an unnatural way and land in an infinite yellow office space. The walls are covered in a monotonous shade of yellow, illuminated by flickering fluorescent lights that hum with an unsettling rhythm. There is no visible exit, no clear path to freedom. The only thing you think about is escaping.

FEATURES


  • A unique camcorder graphic that makes the experience even better!

  • Interactions with Light Switches, Doors and much more!

  • Many Atmospheric and Liminal areas with Variation!

DISCLAIMER


This game was made with the Unreal engine 5 and is not recommended for low end systems.
